subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored his 300th career goal and raised his N.H.L.-leading point total to 80, but his injury-depleted Pittsburgh Penguins fell, 4-1, to the Flyers.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored his 300th career goal and raised his N.H.L.-leading point total to 80, but his injury-depleted Pittsburgh Penguins fell, 4-1, to the Flyers.
